info.title: Composio OpenAPI
info.description: Composio SDK: Equip your agent with high-quality tools and build your real-world usecase

get.description: Retrieve a list of all applications based on query parameters.

schema.description: Whether to include local tools or not

200.description: List of all openapi spec tools
Get all connections for the current user
Initiates a connection for the given integration and mark the connection status as initiated if the auth scheme is OAuth1 or OAuth2
Retrieve details of a specific connected account by its ID

post.description: Enables a trigger for a connected account and specific trigger name.

get.description: Lists active triggers based on query parameters.

patch.description: Switches the status of a trigger instance.

post.description: Sets a universal callback URL for the client.

get.description: Retrieves the universal callback URL set for the client.
Fetches logs based on connection and integration details.
Retrieve a list of all actions based on query parameters.

post.description: Execute an action. Support both connected account and no auth auth.
Get the inputs for an action with NLA
Execute an action with direct auth.

schema.description: Query to get the data for
Start time of the event in ISO 8601 format
End time of the event in ISO 8601 format
Time interval for which data needs to be fetched
Time period to get the data for
